content.rendered:
Why Sponsor?

The robotics and intelligent systems sector has reached a critical stage, is expanding very quickly, and is poised for additional rapid, dramatic growth. The Robotics Summit is a new and unique sales, branding and marketing opportunity for those companies offering products, technologies and services that support the development of advanced robotics systems, and which assist technical professionals bringing the next generation of robotics solutions to market.

Over 2,000 technical and business professionals from all over the world, chartered with developing the next generation of commercial class robotics and intelligent systems products and services will be in attendance, including:

  • Software and Hardware Developers
  • Global 2000 Businesses
  • OEMs and Manufacturers
  • Producers of Robotics and Intelligent Solutions
  • Researchers and Academics
  • Media Representatives
  • Technology/Business Analysts
  • Investment Professionals

Co-located Event

Co-located with DeviceTalks Boston, exhibitors of the Robotics Summit will have access to an additional 1,000+ engineering and business professionals in the medical technology community who will have open access to the expo floor for face-to-face meetings with solution providers.
